desc:
I am an AI Engineer passionate about bridging the gap between cutting-edge AI research and practical application. 

With a strong foundation in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and full-stack development, I focus on building systems that are not only performant but also user-centric and scalable. 

I believe that the best solutions come from a deep understanding of both the data and the user's needs. I thrive in fast-paced, collaborative environments where I can tackle complex challenges, whether it's optimizing a language model for a specific domain or architecting a real-time web service. 

Always eager to learn, I view every project as an opportunity to expand my technical horizons and deliver meaningful impact.
